position4.reversed: Inverted Ten of Cups, discords or unrest can make effort difficult to see.
position4.context: Your efforts are strengthened by creating a harmonious environment.

position5.upright: Ten of Cups, you can create more harmonious changes in your career by establishing work-life balance.
position5.reversed: Inverted Ten Cups will support the development of resolving unrest.
position5.context: To change your career, you must consider work-life balance.

position6.upright: Ten of Cups, pressure from family or environmental expectations may have created limits in your career in the past.
position6.reversed: Reversed Ten of Cups, disharmony or family problems may have hindered your current career.
position6.context: Past family pressures affect your career today.

position7.upright: Ten of Cups indicates that the outcome of the career journey will bring harmonious life balance and peace.
position7.reversed: The inverted Ten of Cups may overshadow the outcome of unrest or disharmony.
position7.context: The result will be a peaceful and balanced life.

position1.upright: The Prince of Cups brings new ideas, creativity and intuitive insights. A creative start or a surprising opportunity may appear in your career.
position1.reversed: The Prince of Cups reversed indicates that you are acting out of immature emotions or dreamy expectations. This could lead you down an unrealistic path.
position1.context: Your real career is where you can freely express your intuition and imagination.

position2.upright: The Prince of Cups recommends you try your creative ideas boldly. Starting new projects can move you forward.
position2.reversed: The Prince of Cups reversed indicates that opportunities may be missed due to dreaminess and carelessness.
position2.context: To improve your career, you must put your creative ideas into practice.

position3.upright: The Prince of Cups indicates that you are not in control of when inspiration and creative ideas arise.
position3.reversed: The Prince of Cups Reversed suggests that the natural cycle of disappointments or lack of inspiration develops outside of you.
position3.context: You cannot completely determine the arrival of inspiration in your career.

position4.upright: The Prince of Cups shows that he brings creativity and curiosity to his work. Your sincere effort stands out.
position4.reversed: Inverted Prince of Cups, carelessness or dreaminess may limit performance.
position4.context: Your efforts are evident in what you bring to your work with sincerity and curiosity.

position5.upright: Prince of Cups: Using your imagination more and trying new ideas brings beneficial change in your career.
position5.reversed: Prince of Inverted Cups, you should stop dreaming and put your ideas into practice.
position5.context: To change your career, you must put your ideas into practice.

position6.upright: The Prince of Cups may have hindered his career in the past by not putting his dreams into practice or being too dreamy.
position6.reversed: Prince of Cups Reversed: A lack of emotional maturity may have limited opportunities in the past.
position6.context: Not putting your dreams into practice in the past hinders your career today.

position7.upright: The Prince of Cups indicates that the outcome of your career journey will be shaped by new ideas and creativity.
position7.reversed: The Reversed Prince of Cups may delay results due to wishful thinking or lack of execution.
position7.context: The result will be creating new opportunities with your creativity.

position1.upright: The Knight of Cups symbolizes following your ideals and following your heart. An emotionally satisfying path may be waiting for you in your career.
position1.reversed: The reversed Knight of Cups indicates that you are caught up in dreaminess, escapism, or unrealistic goals.
position1.context: Your true career will find you when you follow your heart.

position2.upright: The Knight of Cups recommends that you follow your ideals. Developing passion and emotional connection in your career will grow you.
position2.reversed: The Knight of Cups reversed shows that you should not get caught up in unrealistic goals.
position2.context: To improve your career, you should focus on the goals you set your heart on.

position3.upright: The Knight of Cups tells you that the time for idealistic opportunities or emotional overtures is not in your hands.
position3.reversed: The Knight of Cups reversed indicates that disappointments sometimes arise from external circumstances.
position3.context: You can't change the timing of some offers in your career.

position4.upright: The Knight of Cups shows that he has an idealistic approach to his work and tries to do his best.
position4.reversed: Reversed Knight of Cups: Excessive dreaminess or passivity can undermine the effect of effort.
position4.context: Çaban stands out with his idealistic approach.

position5.upright: The Knight of Cups, translating his idealism into concrete projects brings powerful change in his career.
position5.reversed: Reversed Knight of Cups, staying away from excessive dreaminess will take you further.
position5.context: To change your career, you must turn your vision into practice.

position6.upright: The Knight of Cups may have been too idealistic in the past and not taking concrete steps, which may have made his career difficult.
position6.reversed: Reversed Knight of Cups, being disconnected from reality may have prevented you from moving forward in the past.
position6.context: Excessive idealism in the past affects his career today.

position7.upright: The Knight of Cups indicates that the outcome of your career journey will be progress with idealistic goals and vision.
position7.reversed: The Knight of Cups reversed can be debilitating as a result of detachment from reality.
position7.context: The result will be to move forward with idealistic goals.

position1.upright: The Queen of Cups symbolizes empathy, intuition and emotional depth. You are in the right place in your career where you benefit and inspire others.
position1.reversed: The Queen of Cups reversed may indicate excessive emotionality or neglect of one's own needs.
